org.keyple.seproxy

Class SeRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keyple.seproxy.SeRequest

  • public class SeRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Aggregates the elements of a request to a local or remote SE Reader, sent through a ProxyReader, in order to open a logical channel with a SE application to select, and to transfer a group of APDU commands to run.
    See Also:
    SeResponse

      • SeRequest

        @Deprecated
public SeRequest(java.nio.ByteBuffer aidToSelect,
                             java.util.List<ApduRequest> apduRequests,
                             boolean keepChannelOpen)
        Deprecated. Only provided as a compatibility layer. You should now use SeRequest(List) constructor with a list of SeRequestElements.
        the constructor called by a ProxyReader in order to open a logical channel, to send a set of APDU commands to a SE application, or both of them.
        Parameters:
        aidToSelect - the aid to select
        apduRequests - the apdu requests
        keepChannelOpen - the keep channel open
